pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyze Dose-Volume Histograms and Check Constraints // Functionality for analyzing dose-volume histograms (DVH) in radiation oncology: Read DVH text files, calculate DVH metrics, gEUD, BED, EQD2, NTCP, TCP, show DVH diagrams, check and visualize quality assurance constraints for the DVH. Includes web-based graphical user interface.
